name: Blindfolded (itch)
description:
Blindfolded is a thriller interactive sound novel game. No, no synopsis will be write here as it might ruins the experience playing it. Only one clue though, from the title, blindfolded.

Made using TyranoBuilder Visual Novel Studio software for the TyranoBuilder Summer Game Jam 2015.

Gameplay is about more than 20 minutes, depending on how fast you read and the choices that you make in the game.

How To Play:

1. Use headphone for better experience.

2. Don't read it in a rush. Let the text reveals itself to set the mood right.

3. Click when there is a blinking dot at the end of the sentence to move on to the next part.

4. Finish it once, and let your friends play it next. The thrills are good as you don't play it repeatedly.

IMPORTANT!!

This game is not for colour blind people. I am so sorry and I will update it as soon as possible.

This is my first game ever and I know it is not polished enough, so please be nice to me! :3 . Less than 5 days making it for approximately 50 hours after I was too late to saw that the competition has already started.

Comments and suggestions are very appreciated!
